data.name: AHOD: All Hands on Deck!
data.detailed_description:
The Journey Begins


Gather stat enhancing crew, powerful weapons, magical loot, and strategic tools to master your deck composition. Space is limited, so choose wisely!



An imaginative take on sailing combat. Explore the generated world map and engage in combat ways of which has never been seen.



Join the ranks of the fiercest captains in the land and prove your worth in the arena! Work together with your team to fend off the creatures of the sea in hostile PvE environments, or go head-to-head with other captains in thrilling PvP action. Show the world that you're the ultimate captain!


About the Game

In AHOD, you'll need all hands on deck to succeed! It's a fast-paced sailing deckbuilder that takes place in a fantastical world of pirates, plunder, and discovery. You can ride the winds to swiftly travel from port to port, or take the uncharted path - the risk is worth the reward! Sail solo or with friends in online multiplayer and discover better lands that lie beyond the horizon. Build your deck. Build your crew. Build your legend.

‚Ä¢ Embark on a journey across a handcrafted 8km x 8km map, filled with randomized challenges that make every play a unique experience.
‚Ä¢ Weapons, crew, and other loot in this game are all represented by different cards. Space is limited, so choose wisely when selecting which cards make it to your deck.
‚Ä¢ Discover portals to the new lands and continue your legend

data.short_description: Build the strongest sailing crew and defeat your opponents in AHOD: All Hands on Deck! This fast-paced deckbuilder game features exciting card gameplay, strategic deck composition, and a variety of powerful weapons and magical loot.

  • OS: Windows 10
  • DirectX: Version 11
